F

feedCrocodile(Animal, String, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
When crocodile gets fed, this direction of both ways (beach/jungle or jungle/beach) is free, it moves to the other beach/jungle connection and blocks the way the other direction, same happens with thorny bush
feedShark(Animal, String, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
When shark gets fed, it moves from eastern beach to island (or island to eastern beach) and the way between eastern beach and island is free until player moves to other room
feedWith(String) - Method in class zork.Game
Method to implement command feed with
feedWith(Animal, String, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
Method feed to feed animals with necessary item and then call method action after fed
fightApeKing(String, Enemy, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
Method generates random number between 1 and 6 and selects if the player has to block, do a critical strike or just attack.
fightBear(String, Enemy, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
Method generates random number between 1 and 3 and selects if the player has to block, do a critical strike or just attack.
fightEnemy(String, Enemy, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
Method to fight enemies

Method for loading the game state from the given file For the start of the game this function is called with database.json If this function is called during the game it will try to load savedGame.json if it exists

U

use(String) - Method in class zork.Game
Method to use items (command "use ")
useBananaWithApes(T, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
distract apes and set way to north free
useCauldron(NonItem, Item, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
use a given item to interact with the cauldron
useFishingRodWithFishSwarm(Item, NonItem, Room) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
The item fish will appear in room and can be taken
useFluteWithSnake(T, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
removes snake and set way to north free
useKeyWithDoor(Item, T, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
Opens door, way to north is free now
useMachete(Item, T, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
Uses Machete with given NonItem
useMacheteWithThornyBush(Item, NonItem, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
When the thorny bush gets cut down, this direction of both ways (beach/jungle or jungle/beach) is free, it moves to the other beach/jungle connection and blocks the way the other direction, same happens with the crocodile
useNoteWithSuitcase(Item, NonItem, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
When item note gets used with nonItem suitcase, the suitcase gets opened and releases its items, also the rucksack to increase the size of players inventory
usePickaxeWithCairn(Item, T, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
removes cairn and releases stone in the room + set way to west free
useRopeWithTree(Item, NonItem, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
attach rope to banana tree and make bananas reachable
useRucksack(Item, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
When item rucksack is used the players inventory size will be increased by the rucksacks strength, rucksack gets removed from current room
useSeaShellWithRitual(Item, T, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
removes seashell and adds pickaxe to the players inventory
useSpear(Item, T, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
Uses spear with given NonItem
useSpearWithCoconutPalm(Item, NonItem, Room) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
Throw spear at coconut palm to get item coconut, will only work every third time the player tries this
useWith(String) - Method in class zork.Game
Method to implement command use with

useWith(Item, Item, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
Method to implement specific constellations of items and item of the inventory to do specific things
